title: The New Filter Mandate Bill Is An Unmitigated Disaster | Electronic Frontier Foundation
description: After the defeat of SOPA/PIPA, Big Content has mostly focused on quiet, backroom deals for copyright legislation, like the unconstitutional CASE Act, which was so unpopular it had to be slipped into a must-pass bill in the dead of winter. But now, almost exactly a decade later, they’ve come...
